name: Shooting Hurts
description: A brand new AI, a weapon that turns its health into projectiles, and a gauntlet of tests designed to test their limits. How will you make every shot count when shooting hurts?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities Storage: 76 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible sound card
